page.title: 16Baltasound School:The Facts
page.content: There are 127 pupils in the school at the moment: 45 secondary and 82 primary pupils. There are 4 groups of buildings. The main building which contains the rooms for Science,English Mathematics,Homecraft,Primaries 5,6 & 7, toilets, swimming pool,Technical, Canteen, staff room and office,games hall and a sport's store, which was built in l967.The Horsa buildings which contain Primaries l,2,3 & 4 and an Art room built in l948.There is the old school which contains the History, Geography,French room, a remedial room and medical room, built in l878. The newest building was put up in l980, containing the Music,Typing and T.V rooms.There is a tuck shop,moped,T.V & video,music equipment,computers etc. There are inter-school netball and football leagues where schools from all over Shetland take part.
